lines.text: All we did was make love.
In handcuffs.
It was different, but it was still making love. Have you ever seen animals make love, Frank? It's intense. It's violent. But they never really hurt each other.
We're not animals.
Yes, we are.
Don't look so hurt, Alan. I fucked you, I fucked Andrew, I fucked Frank. That's what I do; I fuck. And it made me 8 million dollars!
Are you scared?
No.
Sex was a game to her. She got off on the control. She always used to tell me it had to be her way.
What do you think, Frank? I called to tell her all the nasty details? Maybe I gave her some advice.
There's nothing wrong with admitting that you want me, Frank.
Miss Carlson, you stated that you handcuffed Andrew Marsh before having sex with him the night of his death.
It wasn't before. It was during.
My way.
I'm hard to resist.
It's not a crime to be a beautiful woman.
It's not a crime to be a great lay!

She is a beautiful woman. But when this trial is over, you will see her no differently than a gun, or a knife, or any other instrument used as a weapon. She's a killer, and the worst kind. A killer who disguised herself as a loving partner!
Counsel for the Prosecution has already used this witness to establish the state of mind of the deceased. He opened the can, Your Honor.
And I do see worms crawling all around you, Mr. Garrett.

[watching the erotic tape of Rebecca riding Andrew]
Nice quality
Nice ass
Dad, can you really screw someone to death?
No. Of course not. Besides you don't need to worry about that. Do you?

[chuckling]
No.
Because you are one good-looking guy.
I don't know why men lie; they just do. Men. Lie.
It gets easier, doesn't it Frank?
Let's play another game.
Why watch strangers when you can watch friends.
Do you believe in karma, Frank?
No.
Whatever you call it. People usually get what they deserve except for lawyers.
Dr. McCurdy. What would cocaine do to someone in Mr. Marsh's condition?
It would accelerate his heartbeat.
And if he were having sex while under the influence of such a stimulant?
It would be the same as shooting a loaded gun at him!
